Radio-stations.name: Radio-Citizen
Radio-stations.description: This is Kenya’s biggest radio station owing not only to its footprint but the audience it commands. It targets the ‘common man’, who form a greater part of the country’s population.

Radio-stations.name: Radio-Milele
Radio-stations.description: Welcome to Milele FM,The home of African hits. The future inspires us. Milele, exists to inspire.

Radio-stations.name: NRG-Radio
Radio-stations.description: We are an Urban Contemporary Hit Radio Station broadcasting in Kenya’s Urban cities.We are a multi-platform entertainment experience that embraces digital technology.

Radio-stations.name: Ghetto-Radio
Radio-stations.description: This is an urban radio station located in Nairobi. Ghetto Radio Nairobi was established in 2007 and is currently a popular station among the youngsters. It broadcasts news, information, sports and lifestyle programmes.

Radio-stations.name: classic-105
Radio-stations.description: Classic 105 is a broadcast radio station in Nairobi, Kenya, providing News and Talk shows combined with Classic Rock, Pop and R&B Hits music.
